(block (sungStations) (switch ; Must have befriended the Huari (!= (typGetData &svHuariEmpire; 'status) 'friend) (msnDestroy gSource)

; Create the mission (block ( (targetObj (random sungStations)) ) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj)

Language.Text:
"The Sung drove us from our homes; they enslaved our best minds; and they hunt us still in every system save one."
"%targetname% in this system has been attacking us lately and we would like you to destroy it. Will you help us to reclaim our homes?"
"We've programmed the station's coordinates into your ship's computer. Go with the Light!"
"Let the will of the Light be done, though we cannot understand His methods."
"By all the Light's mercy, what are you doing here? Your task remains uncompleted."
"Your failure is also our doom. Maybe we were never meant to bask in the Light's blessings; maybe the darkness of space will consume us after all."

"Even though the Sung are our mortal enemies, I mourn their deaths too. May they find a place in the Light."
"You have shown us the way. In time, if the revelations hold, we will show you the way too."
